display_long_description:
# **PICKABOOM**

# Survive Natural Disasters. Free-to-Play. Weekly Updates. 

Enter the explosive world of PICKABOOM, a **multiplayer VR survival game** where every match feels like the end of the world. Team up with your squad to survive floods, quakes, and freak storms before the next cataclysm hits.
[media]
[media]
[media]

Visit the **Avatar Shop**, led by VR fashion designer George Hermano, and mix survival gear with outrageous couture. Limited-time “disaster collections” drop weekly so you can look iconic while the planet collapses around you.
[media]
[media]

Face terrifyingly **unique monsters** that evolve with every environment, from crawling cave dwellers to colossal storm wraiths. No two encounters are the same.
[media]
[media]

With **weekly updates**, new maps, disasters, and gear drop constantly, keeping the chaos alive. Jump into public or private lobbies, push your friends into danger, or save them just in time.
[media]

Join our Discord community to test new disasters, play with devs, and help shape PICKABOOM’s future!
👉 https://linktr.ee/pickaboomvr

**EQUIP. ADVENTURE. BOOM! PLAY PICKABOOM!** 💥

# **PICKABOOM**

# Survive Natural Disasters. Free-to-Play. Weekly Updates. 

Enter the explosive world of PICKABOOM, a **multiplayer VR survival game** where every match feels like the end of the world. Team up with your squad to survive floods, quakes, and freak storms before the next cataclysm hits.

With **weekly updates**, new maps, disasters, and gear drop constantly, keeping the chaos alive. Jump into public or private lobbies, push your friends into danger, or save them just in time.
